articles.title: Charles Hoskinson doubts CLARITY Act timeline, says Trump crypto czar should quit
articles.description: Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson said the CLARITY Act may not pass this quarter, and criticized US crypto laws for favoring big banks over innovation.

articles.title: Bank of Italy models Ethereum risks if ETH value collapsed
articles.description: The Bank of Italy modeled the extreme scenario of Ether going to zero to show how market risk in Ethereum’s native token could turn into infrastructure and financial stability risks.

articles.title: Standard Chartered said to plan crypto brokerage, trims ETH forecast
articles.description: Standard Chartered is reportedly developing a crypto prime brokerage platform as traditional banks expand digital asset services.

articles.title: Standard Chartered says ‘2026 will be the year of Ethereum’ as bank backs ETH outperformance
articles.description: Standard Chartered forecasts Ethereum outperformance versus Bitcoin, citing network effects and growing real-world asset adoption.

articles.title: XRP stays pinned near $2.05 as the range tightens into a make-or-break zone
articles.description: The market remains level-driven, with potential for a breakout if $2.08 is reclaimed or a breakdown if $2.04 is breached.

articles.title: Morning Minute: a16z Raises $15B, Targets AI &#038; Crypto
articles.description: a16z raised over 18% of all venture capital in 2025 with a goal of "giving everybody a shot." What does that mean exactly?

articles.title: Strategy makes largest bitcoin purchase since July, adds 13,627 BTC
articles.description: Strategy purchased 13,267 BTC for $1.25 billion via the use of common stock and it's perpetual preferred equity STRC.

articles.title: ‘Big orange’: Michael Saylor’s Strategy buys another 13,627 bitcoin for $1.25 billion following MSCI indexing decision
articles.description: Strategy's holdings account for more than 3% of the total 21 million bitcoin supply — worth around $62 billion.

articles.title: Standard Chartered prepares crypto prime brokerage push: Bloomberg
articles.description: Standard Chartered is reportedly preparing a crypto prime brokerage business to be housed within its SC Ventures unit.

articles.title: VelaFi raises $20 million in Series B to expand stablecoin payments infrastructure
articles.description: The LatAm-based company said the funding will support expansion across the U.S. and Asia.

articles.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
articles.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

articles.title: Tether freezes $182 million in USDT stablecoin across five Tron blockchain wallets
articles.description: The freezes were part of Tether's policy to comply with U.S. Treasury sanctions and were executed in a coordinated manner.

articles.title: BNB slides to $900 as traders look to havens
articles.description: The token's price action shows signs of indecision, with a tight trading range and fading selling pressure.

articles.title: What is Crypto.com?
articles.description: Crypto.com is a popular centralized crypto exchange that is also tied to the multi-layer Cronos ecosystem and the CRO token.

articles.title: Quantum computing threatens the $2 trillion Bitcoin network. BTQ Technologies says it has a defense.
articles.description: Post-quantum cryptography specialist BTQ Technologies has introduced ‘Bitcoin Quantum,’ a permissionless fork and testnet of the largest cryptocurrency.

articles.title: Seventy economists urge EU to ‘let the public interest prevail’ on digital euro
articles.description: Economists urge EU lawmakers to back a public digital euro, warning that private stablecoins and foreign payment companies threaten Europe’s monetary sovereignty.

articles.title: Bitcoin fails haven test as Justice Dept. subpoenas Powell: Crypto Daybook Americas
